metadata.description: Base URL for Template Files
Bastion HOst VM size
OpenShift Master VM(s) size
OpenShift Infra VM(s) size
OpenShift Node VM(s) size
OpenShift CNS Node VM(s) size
Region in which the resource group and components will be deployed
Use Managed or Unmanaged Disks
OpenShift cluster prefix. Used to generate master, infra and node hostnames. Maximum of 20 characters.
Number of OpenShift nodes
Size of Datadisk in GB for Docker volume
Administrator username on all VMs and first user created for OpenShift login
Password for OpenShift user to login to OpenShift Console
Enable OpenShift Metrics: true or false
Enable OpenShift Logging: true or false
Enable Container Native Storage: true or false
Red Hat Subscription Manager Username or Organization ID. To find your Organization ID, run on registered server: subscription-manager identity
Red Hat Subscription Manager Password or Activation Key. To find or create your Activation Key, go to: https://access.redhat.com/management/activation_keys
Red Hat Subscription Manager Pool ID with OpenShift entitlements. To find it, run on registered server: subscription-manager list

Red Hat Subscription Manager Pool ID with OpenShift entitlements for Broker / Master Nodes. If not using this, enter the Pool ID for Application Nodes. To find it, run on registered server: subscription-manager list
SSH public key for all VMs
Resource Group that contains the Key Vault
Name of the Key Vault
Key Vault Secret Name that contains the Private Key
Enable Azure as Cloud Provider - true or false
Azure AD Client ID
Azure AD Client Secret
Default Subdomain type - nip.io or custom (defined in next parameter)
Default Subdomain for application routing (Wildcard DNS) - must enter something even if you are using nip.io. Must be all lowercase
Determines whether or not a new virtual network should be provisioned
Name of the resource group for the existing virtual network
Name of the virtual network
Address prefix of the virtual network
Name of the subnet
Base subnet used for the master servers, and needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.1.0.0/16
Name of the subnet
Base subnet used for the infra servers, and needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.2.0.0/16
Name of the subnet
Base subnet used for the infra, node, and CNS servers, and needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix - default is 10.3.0.0/16

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('bash ', variables('masterPrepScriptFileName'), ' ', parameters('rhsmUsernameOrOrgId'), ' ', variables('singlequote'), parameters('rhsmPasswordOrActivationKey'), variables('singlequote'), ' ', parameters('rhsmBrokerPoolId'), ' ', parameters('adminUsername'), ' ', parameters('location'), ' ', variables('newStorageAccountPersistentVolume1'))]
